title: Jacked
description: Jack and Debra: happily married, everything is right in their world. They do it for each other and can’t imagine being happier. But Jack has a past. Oh, Debra knows about it—and she’s curious. So when a friend from that past blows into town, Jack decides to give both himself and his wife a very special gift.This book contains content considered unsuitable for young readers 17 and under, and which may be offensive to some readers of all ages.
author: Raven Morris
